inspiration.title: Words from Our Founder
inspiration.subtitle: Inspiring thoughts that guide our mission

quotes.text:
"Meen Ma3ana" isn't an organization or charity.

This is an idea I've carried in my heart for years, born from a love for those in need. I have no team behind me, no funding. I'm just doing this, one case at a time—listening, checking, and trying my best.

But God sends kind hearts to support me. Every time I ask "Who's with us?" you show up, truly with us ❤️

Let's help and care for those in need as much as we can, so God may help and love us in return ❤️

The poor will be a nation on the Day of Judgment ❤️
